member.summary: Queries one or more node sets and their dependencies
member.param: Pagination: cursor of the last node in the previous page, use for forward paging
Pagination: maximum number of nodes to return, use with after for forward paging.
Pagination: cursor of the first node in the next page. Use for backward paging
Pagination: minimum number of nodes to return, use with before for backward paging.
member.returns: The metadata for the requested nodesets, as well as the metadata for all required notesets.
